page.title: 11SOCIAL CONCERN-WEST NOTTINGH
page.content: QUESTIONNAIRE-SAMPLE=50 86% believe that facilities for teenagers are poor,6% disagree,8% don't know.50% think the neighbourhood needs more leisure facilities,28% don't know.32% say more rate-money should go on housing and roads,22% choose leisure facilities,18% say the needy.74% say disapprove of spending on nuclear weapons.46% want the Basford flats site used for leisure facilities.,38% for housing,14% for O.A.P homes.22% want to raise the school leaving age,70% disagree.44% disagree with sending money to Africa,30% agree.34% want heavier punishment for vandals.10% want more spending on the police,8% on education,2% on jobs.20% didn't know.
